data.meta_description: Noale, located in the Metropolitan City of Venice, Veneto, Italy, is a charming town that forms part of the Miranese district along with several neighboring municipalities. This picturesque destination is known for being the birthplace of the thrash metal band Catarrhal Noise and as the headquarters of motorcycle manufacturer Aprilia. Visitors can enjoy a summer holiday at a delightful B&B surrounded by the beautiful countryside of Noale.
